actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.

summary.text: Amends the Bretton Woods Agreement Act to authorize the United States Governor of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development to vote an increase in the capital stock of the Bank and to subscribe to a specified number of the additional shares. Authorizes the appropriation of $1,568,858,175 to pay for such subscription.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.
